articles.title: Heatwave-hit jamboree in South Korea in doubt as many scouts leave - Reuters
articles.description: South Korea decided on Saturday to press on with hosting the World Scout Jamboree, despite warnings about the dangers posed by the extreme heat the country is enduring, and the U.S. and British contingents pulling out a week early.
